snippet: Record snow in Boston the past 17 days has exposed the vulnerabilities of the debt-ridden Massachusetts Bay Transportation Authority, as numerous breakdowns and delays have occurred.
abstract: Record snowfalls in Boston area have choked service on subways, buses and commuter rail lines operated by Massachusetts Bay Transportation Authority, frustrating scores of Boston commuters; underfunded system has long history of shortcomings.

byline.original: By KATHARINE Q. SEELYE and JESS BIDGOOD

lead_paragraph: Record snow in Boston the past 17 days has exposed the vulnerabilities of the debt-ridden Massachusetts Bay Transportation Authority, as numerous breakdowns and delays have occurred.

headline.main: As Snow Piles Up in Boston, So Do Frustrations With Beleaguered Transit System
headline.print_headline: As Snow Piles Up in Boston, So Do Frustrations With Beleaguered Transit System
